ValidationRule.description: 'Nokia Sales' profile and 'Sales Ops' profile should not be allowed to edit a prospect after creation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISNEW()), (RecordType.Name='Prospect'), OR($Profile.Name = "Nokia Sales Profile",$Profile.Name = "Sales Ops Profile") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Editing prospect record after creation is not allowed. Please work directly with your CMD Market Key User if any changes are required.
